arts.ttl: Holders PSG outclass Atalanta 4-0 in UCL opener
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain made a winning start in defence of their Champions League title as they outclassed Atalanta in an impressive 4-0 win at Parc des Princes.

arts.ttl: PSG copes without star forwards and routs Atalanta 4-0 in Champions League
arts.sum: It was on display once again as central defender Marquinhos, winger Khvicha Kvaratskhelia, left back Nuno Mendes and substitute Gonçalo Ramos all scored at Parc des Princes. Mayulu came off shortly after Mendes had made it 3-0 in the 51st minute after combining with Barcola down the left and showing excellent close control before firing a shot inside the post.

arts.ttl: PSG vs Atalanta – The Parisians’ ratings: a Kvaratskhelia of great evenings
arts.sum: This Wednesday, on Matchday 1 of the 2025-2026 Champions League, Paris Saint-Germain faced Atalanta at the Parc des Princes. After a match in which the Red and Blue largely dominated, they won 4-0 (see video recap). Here are our ratings for the Parisians. Goalkeeper – Lucas Chevalier (6) – A first half played like a […]

arts.ttl: Luis Enrique: ‘Atalanta press and cause problems, but PSG had to start strong’
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain coach Luis Enrique insists the 4-0 Champions League victory over Atalanta was not...

arts.ttl: Atalanta scare as duo De Ketelaere and Scalvini suffer injury in PSG loss
arts.sum: Atalanta duo Charles De Ketelaere and Giorgio Scalvini could miss their club’s match against Torino...

arts.ttl: Champions League | PSG 4-0 Atalanta: Dea outclassed in Paris
arts.sum: Atalanta could thank Marco Carnesecchi, who also saved a penalty, for keeping the scoreline down...

arts.ttl: PSG vs Atalanta – Official lineups: Kvaratskhelia starts, not Ramos!
arts.sum: This Wednesday at the Parc des Princes, Paris Saint-Germain will face Atalanta in the first matchday of the 2025-2026 UEFA Champions League (kick-off at 9:00 PM, CET). Here are the official lineups for this match: As always, we will wait until kick-off to confirm the exact tactical formations. PSG (4-3-3) – Barcola – Mayulu – […]

arts.ttl: Champions League Liveblog: Ajax vs. Inter and PSG vs. Atalanta
PSG vs Atalanta – Watch the Paris pre-match live
arts.sum: This Wednesday, for the first matchday of the 2025-2026 Champions League season, Paris Saint-Germain will face Atalanta at the Parc des Princes. Kick-off is at 9:00 PM CET, but the club invites fans to join them for pre-match coverage, including live footage of the players’ warm-up, starting at 7:45 PM. Watch the live stream here:

arts.ttl: PSG vs Atalanta – De Roon reveals the key to what will be a “great challenge”
arts.sum: This Wednesday at 9 pm (CET) Paris Saint-Germain will face Atalanta at the Parc des Princes for the first matchday of the 2025-2026 Champions League. In a press conference, Marten De Roon, the 34-year-old midfielder of the Italian club, spoke about this match and the Parisian opponent, highlighting the key elements of the game. De […]
